pages.text: The $(item)Hellfire Forge$() is one of the core crafting mechanics of $(blood)Blood Magic$(), alongside the $(l:bloodmagic:altar/blood_altar)Blood Altar$(/l) itself. Here, you can work with the $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/demon_will)Demon Will$() you have harvested from mobs, to allow you to create $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/sentient_tools)Sentient Tools$(), including the $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/demonic_items/sentient_sword)Sentient Sword$(), $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/will_manipulation/soul_gem)Tartaric Gems$(), various $(item)reagents$(), $(l:bloodmagic:alchemy_array/functional_arrays/arcane_ash)Arcane Ash$(), and many things besides.
